trans-unit.source: Represents the Dispatcher when it is in a disable state and provides a means to re-enable dispatcher processing.
trans-unit.target: 當它處於停用狀態，並提供方法來重新啟用發送器處理，則表示發送器。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> returns a DispatcherProcessingDisabled object when it is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A>當呼叫時傳回 DispatcherProcessingDisabled 物件。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A>

trans-unit.source: Disabling dispatcher processing is an advanced method that is intended to eliminate the chance of unrelated reentrancy.
trans-unit.target: 停用發送器處理是一種進階的方法，目的是要避免不相關的重新進入的機會。

trans-unit.source: The effects of disabling processing are as follows: - [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr#initcap](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clrsharpinitcap-md.md)] locks will not pump messages internally.
trans-unit.target: 停用處理的影響如下:-[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr#initcap](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clrsharpinitcap-md.md)]鎖定將會不提取的訊息在內部。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> objects are not allowed to be pushed.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame>物件不允許推送。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame>

trans-unit.source: - Message processing is not permitted.
trans-unit.target: 的不允許訊息處理。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled.Dispose%2A> on the DispatcherProcessingDisabled object will re-enable dispatcher processing.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled.Dispose%2A>上 DispatcherProcessingDisabled 物件將會重新啟用發送器處理。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Re-enables dispatcher processing.
trans-unit.target: 發送器處理會重新啟用。

trans-unit.source: Disabling dispatcher processing is an advanced method that is intended to eliminate the chance of unrelated reentrancy.
trans-unit.target: 停用發送器處理是一種進階的方法，目的是要避免不相關的重新進入的機會。

trans-unit.source: The effects of disabling processing are as follows: - [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr#initcap](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clrsharpinitcap-md.md)] locks will not pump messages internally.
trans-unit.target: 停用處理的影響如下:-[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr#initcap](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clrsharpinitcap-md.md)]鎖定將會不提取的訊息在內部。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> objects are not allowed to be pushed.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame>物件不允許推送。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame>

trans-unit.source: - Message processing is not permitted.
trans-unit.target: 的不允許訊息處理。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled"></xref> object is equal to this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled"></xref>物件是否等於此<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate for equality.
trans-unit.target: 要評估以進行等號比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的物件等於這<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled"></xref>物件; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A signed 32-bit integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 帶正負號的 32 位元整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled"></xref> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled"></xref>物件是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個物件。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled"></xref>物件為相等; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled"></xref> objects are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled"></xref>物件不相等。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個物件。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled"></xref> objects are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled"></xref>物件不相等，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
